content: hello everyone and welcome to the final pattern of 2023 yep the year is already over crazy isn t it but for now a few words about today s pattern at hand snom i wanted to make something winter-y and as i am still working towards reducing my stash can only take me another year or so otl this guy came in handy snom may have many many pieces and is a bit different from your normal amigurumi but still simple enough to make just needs a bit of patience i hope you will enjoy making this little guy to brighten up your winter home materials to make snom you will need a 2 5mm crochet hook white and light blue yarn a tapestry needle and scissors stuffing safety eyes or black embroidery thread i highly recommend pins for sewing a stitch marker to help you keep track of the start of the round please note that you can make snom using any size crochet hook and yarn weight for a smaller or bigger result using dk yarn and a 2 5mm crochet hook snom should be about 10cm tall and 15-20cm long stitches & abbreviations the pattern is written using us crochet terms in continuous spirals you will need to know the following kinds of stitches to make him magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet decrease decrease preferably using the invisible decrease method increase increase working into front loops only flo if you like what i m doing please consider following me over at twitter @rinamogrynaart and/or supporting me on ko-fi @rinamogryna <3
